#summary API definition to interact with Bicycle LED POV by communicating by USB

=Write on LEDs: command 1=
Usage: 1; _byte_1_; _byte_2_; _byte_3_; _byte_4_

_Byte_x_ bits represents each state of LEDs - bit 0 of _byte_1_ represents the state of the first LED.

=Read byte on EEPROM memory: command 2=

=Write byte on EEPROM memory: command 3=
